item.content:encoded:
Price: $145.00 - $101.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:18 UTC – Details)

  • Link adoration in the Swarovski® Infinity Heart Necklace. Pave heart pendant is highlighted by a rose-gold infinity pendant and link chain.
  • Lobster claw closure provides an adjustable length.
  • Imported.
  • Measurements:
    • Chain Circumference: 14 1⁄2 in
    • Adjuster Length: 2 in
    • Pendant Height: 7⁄12 in
    • Pendant Width: 1 0⁄1 in
    • Weight: 0.1 oz

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 15, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09XBFJ56W

Minimalist and unique: The Infinity Heart necklace features a dainty heart entwined with a delicate infinity sign and paired with a touch of sparkling clear crystal pavé on a delicate chain
Designed to last: Swarovski jewelry will maintain its brilliance over time when simple care practices are observed; remove before contact with water, lotions or perfumes to extend your jewelry’s life
Versatile and eye-catching: Whether an everyday accent or a unique, conversation-starting accessory this Infinity pendant necklace is a simple piece that will complement any look on any occasion
Items delivered: 1 x Swarovski infinity heart pendant for women, 14 7/8 inch mixed metal plated chain, with sparkling clear crystals, complete with Swarovski necklace box

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) You deserve nothing but the best wearing the Swarovski® Subtle Drops Bracelet featuring a rhodium-plated bracelet sparkling with a brilliance that nothing can compare to. Additional dangling rhodium plated clear crystals. Adjustable sliding closure to help fit any wrist size. Imported. Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 25, 2020 ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $115.00 - $80.50
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:05:54 UTC – Details)

  • You deserve nothing but the best wearing the Swarovski® Subtle Drops Bracelet featuring a rhodium-plated bracelet sparkling with a brilliance that nothing can compare to.
  • Additional dangling rhodium plated clear crystals.
  • Adjustable sliding closure to help fit any wrist size.
  • Imported.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 25, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ SWAROVSKI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09RV38FY4

Vividly sparkling: The entirety of the delicate rhodium plated chain is adorned with circular clear crystals and finished with adjustable bolo closure
Designed to last: Swarovski jewelry will maintain its brilliance over time when simple care practices are observed; remove before contact with water, lotions or perfumes to extend your jewelry’s life
A thoughtful gift: With its timeless design and polished look, this bracelet goes with any collection, whether for you or a gift for celebrating friendship, birthdays and other memorable moments
Items delivered: 1 x Swarovski Subtle collection bracelet for women, with adjustable rhodium plated chain, clear Swarovski crystals and bolo closure, complete with Swarovski bracelet box

Selected nature stones; Cutting ,Sanding , Polishing and punching ;Handmade with double-deck elastic and flexibility rope
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5.24 x 3.74 x 0.71 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 22, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DAZCOLO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B095MC4TQG

(Multi Azurite) The magnetic field of crystal bracelet can make every day delighted
These are all real stones with high quality and we choose every bead carefully, All bracelets are handmade with double – deck elastic and flexibility rope
Suitable for men and women of all ages, It can also be an excellent gift for your friends/lover
No metal, suitable for any type of skin. You will receive the similar item as picture shown, not exact one since stone is unique.

DAZCOLO —— Your Best Jewelry Friend !

In order to let you receive the satisfactory jewelry, DAZCOLO always have very strict quality requirements. We are grateful for serving you in the field of fashion jewelry

DAZCOLO’s aim is to provide the suitable jewelry for our customer which can be wear at anytime, anywhere

Read more

Multi Azurite

Brief introduction: It is formed in the oxidation zone of copper deposit and often associated with malachite. The high quantity crystals are mainly from the United States, Namibia and Ural Mountains
